card_text: You can reveal 1 other "Gunkan" card in your hand; Special Summon this card from your hand, then apply the following effect based on the revealed card.$N●"Gunkan Suship Shari": You can Special Summon the revealed monster.$N●Other: Place the revealed card on the bottom of the Deck.$NYou can target 1 "Gunkan" monster you control: Change its Level to 4 or 5, then you can add 1 "Gunkan Suship Shari" from your Deck to your hand.$NYou can only use each effect of "Gunkan Suship Uni" once per turn.
